articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Where And When To See The Five-Planet Alignment This Weekend - Forbes
articles.description: Saturn, Neptune, Jupiter, Uranus and Mercury will be aligned in the eastern pre-dawn sky this weekend. Here's exactly when and where to see the rare planetary alignment.
articles.content:
Saturn, Neptune, Jupiter, Uranus and Mercury will be aligned in the eastern pre-dawn sky this ... [+] weekend.
